item.title: CVE-2021-45031|2024-08-04T04:32:13.512Z -- mepsan -- usc%2B
item.description: A vulnerability in MEPSAN's USC+ before version 3.0 has a weakness in login function which lets attackers to generate high privileged accounts passwords.
